content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position((40.0, -82.0))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position((45.0, -83.0))
-  Furnace at position((42.0, -81.0)) 
-  Furnace at position((45.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace at position((40.0, -79.0))

### Lab at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab at position (0.5, 0.5) and inserter at position (3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) and chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure the target entity where you want to extract from has items to extract before extracting items
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it, check if the tile is occupied by another entity
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the lab has the required items to set research before attempting to set research
### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure you have the items to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert items
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure the burner entities have enough fuel to operate before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections before attempting to use it
### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
